name: stock-monorepo
description: Root scripts to run backend (Express) and frontend (Vite).

scripts.start:backend: cd backend && npm run start || node src/app.js
scripts.kill: lsof -i :3001 -t | xargs -r kill -9; lsof -i :5173 -t | xargs -r kill -9
scripts.start: npm run kill && npm run start:all
scripts.start:pm2: npx pm2 start ecosystem.config.js && npx pm2 save
scripts.stop:pm2: npx pm2 stop ecosystem.config.js || true && npx pm2 delete ecosystem.config.js || true
